fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm CBOR decoder deprecation warning no longer appears
fields.request_details: Restart the arthexis web service and clear the latest application log. Load the admin and public login pages that render passkey widgets, then attempt a mock WebAuthn registration using the existing test credential flow. Monitor logs for the session and confirm no warnings mentioning `cbor.decoder` or `cbor2.decoder` are emitted during imports or authentication.
